hero.title: Welcome to OÜ Almar Puit!
hero.subtitle: High-quality, eco-friendly wood products for your home and business.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Founded in 2006 in Southeast Estonia, OÜ Almar Puit brings nature closer to you. We offer eco-friendly solutions for gardens and recreational areas, alongside premium heating and fireplace wood. Our commitment to innovation shines through PRIA funding, enabling us to automate production for top quality and fast delivery.

fireplaceWood.title: Fireplace Wood
fireplaceWood.description: Enjoy warmth with our year-round dried fireplace wood. We offer 30 cm and 25 cm birch logs, packaged in 40L bags or 2 m³ crates – the perfect choice for your fireplace.

heatingWood.title: Heating Wood
heatingWood.description: Premium heating wood for stoves and furnaces, customizable to your desired length. We guarantee dry wood availability year-round.

woodPurchase.title: Wood Purchase
woodPurchase.description: We're looking for reliable suppliers! We purchase birch paper wood, 3 m heating wood, and limited quantities of logs. Contact us to start a partnership.
